description: This file is a JavaScript module that provides an API client for interacting with a Device Management backend. It includes functions for listing, creating, retrieving, updating, deleting devices, and fetching or triggering device statuses. The code uses fetch API for HTTP requests and handles responses with a dedicated function.

methods.name: handleResponse
methods.description: Handles the fetch response, throws an error if response is not ok, otherwise returns JSON data or null for 204 status.

methods.name: listDevices
methods.description: Fetches a list of devices with optional filtering parameters.

methods.name: createDevice
methods.description: Creates a new device with the provided payload.

methods.name: getDevice
methods.description: Retrieves details of a device by its ID.

methods.name: updateDevice
methods.description: Updates an existing device identified by ID with new data.

methods.name: deleteDevice
methods.description: Deletes a device by its ID.

methods.name: triggerStatus
methods.description: Manually triggers a status check for a specific device.
